question: Could you tell me please tell me the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) method of leaving and entering the house...
answer:
QUESTION

Mufti saheb could you please tell the full story of hadhrat Musa(AS) from Hadith, Quran when hadhrat Musa (AS) had a stomach ache and Allah (SWT) ordered hadhrat Musa (as) to go to a certain tree and take the leaves as medicine so Musa (AS) went there took the leaves as Allah (SWT) ordered and Musa (AS) stomach ache dissapeared and the next day hadhrat Musa (AS) had a stomach ache this time he went directly to the tree but did not feel better so Musa (AS) turns to Allah (SWT) and Allah (SWT) tell hadhrat Musa (AS) that the leaves of the tree does not contain a cure its me that who gives cure. (Nearest meaning)  Could you also please let me know which kitab it’s from?

 

Could you tell me please tell me the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) method of leaving and entering the house, which foot did the prophet (pbuh) enter with and which foot did he leave with and could you provide the reference please for peace of heart?

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

1.         I have not heard of the story
2.         The general principal is when one enters a good place , for example the masjid, he should enter with the right foot and when one exists such a place, it should be with the left foot. The same rule applies when entering and leaving ones house. 

And Allah knows best

Wassalam  

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
